title: Migrants Find an Unbridled Route to Greece
body: A Pakistani man prayed on a beach in Kos just after he crossed from Bodrum on an inflatable rubber boat. At least 2,000 migrants crossed this week alone.
summary: A Pakistani man prayed on a beach in Kos just after he crossed from Bodrum on an inflatable rubber boat.At least 2,000 migrants crossed this week alone.
